title: Create Championship with Valid Data
description: Verify that an organizer can create a championship with valid name, dates, categories, and WODs successfully.

steps.description: Log in as organizer.
Navigate to championship creation page.
Fill in championship name, start and end dates, and add multiple categories and WODs.
Submit championship creation form.
Verify championship is created successfully and visible in organizer dashboard.

title: Prevent Championship Creation with Invalid Dates
description: Validate that the system prevents championship creation when start date is after end date.

steps.description: Log in as organizer.
Navigate to championship creation page.
Input championship start date later than the end date.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify that an error message prevents submission and highlights invalid dates.

title: Public Multi-step Registration Flow Success
description: Verify public user can complete multi-step registration flow with valid data and coupon application.

steps.description: Access the public registration page via a championship's unique link.
If not authenticated, create a new user account or log in.
Select a category for registration.
Fill in required athlete and team data.
Apply a valid coupon code.
Proceed to checkout and select a payment method (PIX, credit card, boleto).
Complete payment process.
Verify registration is confirmed, coupon is applied correctly, and payment is authorized.

title: Reject Registration when Category is Full
description: Ensure registration cannot proceed if the selected category has no available slots.

steps.description: Attempt to register for a category that has reached maximum capacity.
Verify system shows an error preventing registration due to lack of availability.

title: Validate Unique CPF Per Championship
description: Verify system disallows multiple registrations with the same CPF within the same championship.

steps.description: Register an athlete with a valid CPF in a championship.
Attempt to register another athlete with the same CPF for the same championship.
Verify system rejects the second registration citing duplicate CPF.

title: Apply Coupon Validation Rules
description: Verify coupons are only applied if within validity period, usage limits, and championship association.

steps.description: Attempt to apply an expired coupon during registration.
Verify coupon is rejected for expiration.
Attempt to apply a coupon that has reached its usage limit.
Verify coupon is rejected due to usage limit.
Attempt to apply a valid coupon not associated with the current championship.
Verify coupon is rejected due to championship association.
Apply a valid coupon that meets all criteria.
Verify coupon discount is correctly applied during checkout.

title: Asaas Payment Authorization via Webhook
description: Verify payment is confirmed only after receiving authorization webhook from Asaas for all payment methods.

steps.description: Complete a registration payment using PIX.
Confirm payment is marked successful only after webhook confirmation.
Complete a registration payment using credit card.
Confirm payment success status only upon webhook confirmation.
Complete a registration payment using boleto.
Verify payment is finalized after webhook notification.

title: Organizer Dashboard - Approve and Reject Registrations
description: Verify that organizers can view pending registrations and approve or reject them with appropriate updates.

steps.description: Log in as organizer and navigate to dashboard.
Locate pending registration.
Approve a registration and verify status updates.
Reject another registration and verify status updates.
Confirmed registrations are marked approved, rejected registrations are marked rejected and not counted.

title: Automatic and Manual Generation of Athlete Batches (Baterias)
description: Verify automatic batch generation distributes athletes based on categories and manual editing is possible.

steps.description: Generate batches automatically for a championship.
Verify athletes are assigned to batches respecting category constraints.
Edit batches manually by the organizer.
Confirm manual changes are saved and visible on the public results and TV mode.

title: Publish Results and Update Leaderboard in Real Time
description: Verify that organizers can publish results for multiple WOD types, and leaderboard updates live publicly.

steps.description: Log in as organizer and access results publication page.
Enter results for different WOD types including time-based and scored WODs.
Publish the results.
Verify leaderboard updates immediately on public facing pages.

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that athletes, organizers, and super admins have access restricted to their permitted features only.

steps.description: Log in as athlete and attempt to access organizer dashboard and admin settings.
Verify access is denied to unauthorized areas.
Log in as organizer and try to access super admin settings.
Verify access is denied.
Log in as super admin and access all areas including fee and tax configuration.
Verify full access to all functionalities.

title: Security Validation: Server-side Validations and RLS
description: Check that server-side validation and Row Level Security prevent unauthorized data modifications and exposures.

steps.description: Attempt to modify registration data or championship settings with insufficient privileges via API or UI.
Verify modification is rejected by server validation.
Query database for data not owned by the user role.
Verify that data access is limited by RLS policies.

title: Performance Under Load: 1000+ Registrations Simultaneous
description: Verify application performance and response time remain within acceptable limits during 1000+ concurrent registration attempts.

steps.description: Simulate 1000+ simultaneous registration requests with valid data.
Ensure initial load time remains below 3 seconds and no data loss or failure occurs.

title: Age Verification for Category Eligibility
description: Confirm that system validates athlete age against category restrictions during registration.

steps.description: Attempt to register an athlete in a category with minimum age requirement not met.
Verify registration is rejected with appropriate error message.
Register an athlete meeting age requirements.
Verify registration is accepted.

title: Organizer Dashboard: Financial Overview and Statistics Accuracy
description: Verify that financial data and registration statistics on dashboard are accurate and updated after payments and registration actions.

steps.description: Log in as organizer and navigate to dashboard.
Validate financial metrics reflect all completed payments accurately.
Confirm registration counts and category statistics match actual data.
Dashboard data matches back-end records in real-time.

title: Leaderboard Real-time Update on Results Editing
description: Verify that any edits to published results dynamically update the leaderboard in real-time.

steps.description: Publish initial results.
Leaderboard updates with initial results.
Edit a published result entry.
Leaderboard is updated immediately reflecting the changes.

title: Public Links Page: Banner and Button Configuration
description: Verify that organizers can customize social media link pages with banners and configurable buttons correctly reflected to viewers.

steps.description: Organizer customizes banner and buttons in configuration page.
Save configuration.
Public link page shows updated banner and buttons as configured.
